items.content_html: easyAuditLogger is a lightweight and easy-to-use module designed to simplify the process of capturing and logging audit events in your Discord bot. Whether you're tracking role changes, message deletions, or user updates, easyAuditLogger handles it smoothly.
items.title: Tomtom-Skywalker/easyauditlogger: easyAuditLogger is a lightweight and easy-to-use module designed to simplify the process of capturing and logging audit events in your Discord bot. Whether you're tracking role changes, message deletions, or user updates, easyAuditLogger handles it smoothly.

items.content_html: TaskHub is a lightweight and intuitive task management app designed to help you organize, prioritize, and complete your tasks efficiently. Whether you're managing personal to-dos, work projects, or team collaborations, TaskHub offers a seamless experience with powerful features that keep you on track.
items.title: mohamedkhaledmk/TaskHub-Task-Management-Website: TaskHub is a lightweight and intuitive task management app designed to help you organize, prioritize, and complete your tasks efficiently. Whether you're managing personal to-dos, work projects, or team collaborations, TaskHub offers a seamless experience with powerful features that keep you on track.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
